EKS Runsparkjob.Name: EKS Runsparkjob

containers.name: spark
containers.command.$: States.Array('/bin/sh', '-c', States.Format('/opt/spark/bin/spark-submit --master https://62021BE274D5057D49FE8494441EA0F0.gr7.us-west-2.eks.amazonaws.com:443 --deploy-mode cluster --class org.apache.spark.examples.SparkPi --conf spark.kubernetes.namespace=spark-team-a --conf spark.kubernetes.container.image=apache/spark:v3.2.1 --conf spark.executor.memory=2G --conf spark.executor.cores=2 local:///opt/spark/examples/jars/spark-examples_2.12-3.2.1.jar'))

stateMachine.name: eks-runjobs
